arm_group.description: Family adenomatous polyposis (APC or MYH genes) Peutz Jeghers Disease Cowden Disease Festooned Polyposis Juvenile Polyposis Hyperplastic Polyposis

brief_summary.textblock: French cohorte about polyposis digestive diseases

clinical_study.brief_title: French Digestive Polyposis Cohorte Family Adenomatous Polyposis With APC and MYH Gene Mutations , Cowden's Disease With PTEN Gene Mutation, Peutz Jeghers Disease With STK 11 Gene Mutation ,juvénil Polyposis With SMAD 4 Gene Mutation , Serrated and Hyperplastic Polyposis

detailed_description.textblock:
Family Adenomatous Polyposis APC and MYH Genes Peutz Jeghers Disease Cowden Disease
      Festooned polyposis Juvenile polyposis Hyperplastic polyposis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  APC Gene mutation

          -  MYH Homozygote mutation

          -  COWDEN Disease with PTEN gene mutation

          -  Peutz Jeghers Disease with STK 11 gene mutation

          -  Juvenile polyposis with SMAD 4 gene mutation

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  heterozygote MYH Gene Mutation

intervention.intervention_name: Procedure surgery behavioral and genetic diagnosis
quality of life after different type of surgery

authority: France: The Commission nationale de l’informatique et des libertés
France: Comité consultatif sur le traitement de l'information en matière de recherche dans le domaine de la santé
France: Haute Autorité de Santé Transparency Commission
France: National Consultative Ethics Committee for Health and Life Sciences

primary_outcome.measure: genetic diagnosis or over 50 polyps in the stomach in the duodenum or in the colon

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
